name: UNCHARTED: Fight for Fortune
description:
Introducing UNCHARTED: Fight for Fortune, an all new strategy game for the PS Vita system, featuring your favorite characters, locations and items from PlayStation's biggest franchise: UNCHARTED.
Key Features:
- Use your cards and battle in head-to-head matches
- Play online in synchronous or asynchronous gameplay (Wi-Fi or 3G connection required)
- Challenge multiple opponents at one time
- Customize your deck and choose from your favorite characters
- Over 300 cards available to power-up and unlock
- Build your defense and fight against your rivals
- Launch directly from UNCHARTED: Golden Abyss's Live Area
